casebody.data:
Peters, Appellant, v. Haas et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Peters v. Haas (1988), 38 Ohio St. 3d 61.]

(No. 87-1701 Submitted June 8, 1988 Decided July 20, 1988.) Scott H. Ray, Jr., for appellant. Freund, Freeze & Arnold, Stephen V. Freeze and Brian McNair, for appellees.

This cause is reversed and remanded on authority of Frysinger v. Leech (1987), 32 Ohio St. 3d 38, 512 N.E. 2d 337.

Moyer, C.J., Cacioppo, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Mary Cacioppo, J., of the Ninth Appellate District, sitting for Sweeney, J.
